Class Player

java.lang.Object
group33.VirtualPet.src.main.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Virtual Pet game, tracking their progress, pets, and game statistics.

The Player class manages:

  • Player identity (name)
  • Game score and points system
  • Current pet ownership
  • Inventory of food and gift items
  • Play time tracking and session management
  • Timestamps for last interactions (playing with pet, vet visits)
Since:
Winter 2025
Author:
Team 33 (Dhir, Kostya, Fatima, Anna)

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name)
      Creates a new Player with default initial state.
      Parameters:
      name - The player's name (cannot be null or empty)

  • Method Details

    • adoptPet

      public void adoptPet(Pet pet)
      Adopts a pet, making it the player's current companion.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to adopt (null to abandon current pet)

    • incrementScore

      public void incrementScore(int points)
      Increases the player's score by specified points.
      Parameters:
      points - The positive number of points to add

    • decrementScore

      public void decrementScore(int points)
      Decreases the player's score by specified points (never goes below 0).
      Parameters:
      points - The positive number of points to subtract

    • startSession

      public void startSession()
      Starts a new play session by recording the current time. Must be paired with endSession() to track duration.

    • endSession

      public void endSession()
      Ends the current play session and updates total play time. Calculates duration since startSession() was called.

    • setTotalPlayTime

      public void setTotalPlayTime(Duration duration)
      Sets the total accumulated play time.
      Parameters:
      duration - The new total play time (cannot be null)

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)
      Sets the player's score directly.
      Parameters:
      score - The new score value (will not be lower than 0)

    • setInventory

      public void setInventory(Inventory inventory)
      Replaces the player's inventory with a new one.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The new inventory (cannot be null)

    • getTotalPlayTime

      public Duration getTotalPlayTime()
      Returns:
      The total accumulated play time across all sessions

    • getAveragePlayTime

      public double getAveragePlayTime()
      Calculates average duration of all play sessions.
      Returns:
      Average session length in seconds, or 0 if no sessions recorded

    • resetPlayTimeStatistics

      public void resetPlayTimeStatistics()
      Resets all play time statistics (total and session history).

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Returns:
      The player's inventory of items

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      The player's name

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns:
      The current game score

    • getCurrentPet

      public Pet getCurrentPet()
      Returns:
      The currently owned pet, or null if none

    • setLastP

      public void setLastP(long last)
      Sets timestamp of last play interaction with pet.
      Parameters:
      last - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch

    • getLastP

      public long getLastP()
      Returns:
      Timestamp of last play interaction with pet in milliseconds since epoch

    • getLastV

      public long getLastV()
      Returns:
      Timestamp of last vet visit in milliseconds since epoch

    • setLastV

      public void setLastV(long last)
      Sets timestamp of last vet visit.
      Parameters:
      last - Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch
